project.description: Do a "normal" build from SVN. Do more testing than the matrix builds.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!bash LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/cygdrive/c/Progra~1/Java/jdk1.6.0_21/lib/tools.jar:/usr/jdk/instances/jdk1.6.0/jre/lib/i386/client:/usr/jdk/instances/jdk1.6.0/jre/lib/i386:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH
cd trunk
#$HUDSON_HOME/bin/verifyBuildJars2 hudsondir=$HUDSON_DIR echo HUDsonDIr = $HUDSON_DIR
# ./d.bat builder ./d.bat clean ./d.bat ./d.bat mapper ./d.bat copyphoneme ./d.bat -prod -mac -o2 rom -metadata cldc imp debugger ls -l > sizereport.txt ./d.bat map -cp:cldc/j2meclasses:imp/j2meclasses:debugger/j2meclasses squawk.suite ./d.bat genspec ./d.bat jvmenv ./d.bat systemproperties ./d.bat Mnemonics ./d.bat OPC ./d.bat OperandStackEffect ./d.bat Verifier ./squawk -h ./squawk -version
$hudsondir/bin/runsmoketest.sh DELEGATING ls $hudsondir/bin/ rm -rf tempdoc
echo MAKEAPI DISABLED FOR NOW! #java -jar build.jar -verbose makeapi squawk.suite.api cldc/preprocessed:imp/preprocessed:debugger/preprocessed tempdoc -verbose -docletpath build.jar
java -jar $hudsondir/findbugs/lib/findbugs.jar -textui -project $hudsondir/bin/findbugs-bootstrap.fbp -exclude $hudsondir/bin/findbugs-filter.xml -output findbugs.xml
mkdir tmp cp squawk squawk.suite squawk.suite.metadata tmp ./d.bat clean mv tmp/squawk tmp/squawk.suite tmp/squawk.suite.metadata . rmdir tmp
